title: Microsoft Power Automate Samples
tagLine: Example Flows for Common Adobe Acrobat Sign Use Cases
creator: Todd Guerra

keyFeature.title: Send Custom Emails
keyFeature.desc: Instead of using the standard Adobe Acrobat Sign emails, send your own custom emails for signing steps

keyFeature.title: Automatically Send from Sharepoint
keyFeature.desc: Upload a file, automatically send it for signature

keyFeature.title: Mimic Web Forms for More Flexibility
keyFeature.desc: Call your flow, get back the signing URL, then redirect your signer to the agreement

content.content: Power Automate is a powerful tool that can streamline your Adobe Acrobat Sign workflows. This set of flows will get your started, with basic flows to use as building blocks.

installation.content: Install each flow in Power Automate by selecting "Import->Import Package (legacy)" in the Power Automate UI and uploading the packages from this repo. Power Automate will guide you through the connections needed.
